description: This step lets you retrieve all information stored inside a Betty Blocks JWT token
label: Parse as JWT

options.label: Alogirthm
options.name: alg
options.info: Outputs the name of the Hashing Algorithm used to sign this JWT

options.label: Authentication Profile ID
options.name: authProfile
options.info: Outputs the Authentication Profile ID of the JWT

options.label: Locale
options.name: locale
options.info: Outputs the users locale. If not set, it will be null.

options.label: Role IDs
options.name: roles
options.info: Outputs an array of the roles IDs associated with this user.

options.name: nbf
options.label: Not valid before
options.info: Contains the time at which this token becomes valid. This is formatted as a unix timestamp

options.label: User ID
options.info: The ID of the user retrieved from this JWT
options.name: user_id
iat
options.label: Issued at
options.info: Contains the time at which this token was issued. This is formatted as a unix timestamp.

options.name: exp
options.label: Expires at
options.info: Contains the time at which this token expires. This is formatted as a unix timestamp.
